website_summaries.verdict: The HP Photosmart A626 is supposed to bridge the gap between the A826 and the A526 snapshot printers by providing lots of features, good print quality, and decent print speeds, but it falls short on the last two counts.
pros: Small size makes it easy to carry around
large touch screen LCD on an adjustable panel
same broad feature set as the Photosmart A826
can make prints as large as 5x7
cons: Slow prints and middling print quality

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted a photo printer, that I could hook up to my Mac, and what I got with this little device is so much more. The setup was easy, and the quality of the pictures is great (much better than the photo printer at my local pharmacy store or Wal Mart). And then you get all the extra features (photo editing, touch screen etc.). There are plenty of hook ups for all flash card formats and flash drives. The only complaint I have : There was no USB cable included. If you are planning to use this printer with your computer, don't forget to order the USB2 cable as well !
customer_reviews.author: D. Christen

customer_reviews.title: HP Photosmart A626 Compact Photo Printer (Q8541A#ABA) We just received ...
customer_reviews.text: HP Photosmart A626 Compact Photo Printer (Q8541A#ABA) We just received this printer and we have not been able to get it set up to print photos. We ran the Alignment set up a couple of times and triple checked the ink cartridges, but it will only print blank photo prints. Any suggestions before we send it back ?
customer_reviews.author: JANN

customer_reviews.title: VACATION PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT LITTLE TRAVEL PRINTER. SUPER QUALITY, LOTS OF EDITING POSSIBILITIES, TITLES, FRAMES, ETC. A LITTLE EXPENSIVE ON THE INK, BUT WORTH IT FOR THE PORTABILITY.
customer_reviews.author: nefer44

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: HP is pretty reliable albeit expensive. I've tried to phase out desktop printing altogether but our communications person wanted to be able to print pictures. It doesn't feed perfectly so edges aren't even and it won't accommodate larger sized paper.
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeFoe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Said it could print with any Bluetooth enabled device and didn’t even work when I tried. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Saviah

customer_reviews.title: Printer Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This printer is ideal for us as we are traveling about the country in an RV and making loads of pictures at historic sites. The photos are sharp, clear and editable right off the camera card in the printer meaning no computer is necessary. The prints are also instantly dry, another bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald G. Ryals

customer_reviews.title: His friends have hunter envy since he can view hunting camera cards easily.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. His friends have hunter envy since he can view hunting camera cards easily.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: So Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my wife because she felt printing pictures from the PC was too difficult. With the easy to follow directions included with this printer my wife was printing pictures in just minutes. The quality of the prints exceeds my high-end photo printer and the unit cost was more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Les M. Bateman

customer_reviews.title: good copier
customer_reviews.text: I like my A646 alot and this is just as good,it's an order printer.It works good and do good good pictures.I look for the copiers every so often,they are use daily.I would rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane   Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this little printer
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for about tow years. I have never had a problem with it. It does great prints in both 4x6 and 5x7. I would definetly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Get small printer
customer_reviews.text: This small compact printer is great for instant printer on the go and travel. It print great for photo to pass out after get together before everyone leave that day.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Cheung-Riley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it did not come with a cord to plug it in.....how do you expect for me to use it??
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rich

customer_reviews.title: Printer instructions hard  for me to understand
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting this printer, but was soon disappointed with its functions. It did not perform as I expected to do. The instructions were difficult for me to understand. I still have not printed a 5X7 print yet. I am back to using my standard Canon printer.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Styles Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant HP printer for quick hard copies of photographs
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant little machine, it's such a shame that HP don't produce more little machines like this
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Craggs

customer_reviews.title: Not Promoting
customer_reviews.text: Great product, crappy company. Someone that refuses to support military, I will refuse to support them. I'm not saying the products are bad, but the company I refuse to promote.
customer_reviews.author: MorganKemp

customer_reviews.title: Anyone in LA looking for one of these?
customer_reviews.text: Got this rad printer and ink/photo-paper for it from my family for Christmas. My sister and mother have the same one and both rave about it. Much as I'd like to take advantage paying rent is a bit more of a priority. Printer retails for at least $185, ink value pack for $45. I'll let you have both for $120. Both items brand new, unopened in box. Save $110 off or half the price of what you'd pay in stores or ordering online. Shoot me an email at jberglun@usc.edu if you're interested. Cash and local pickup please, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Best little printer for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally technically challenged. But I was able to start printing out pictures (once my husband added the printer to my laptop)in 5 minutes. I used my Adobe to edit some pics which printed well. Then I inserted my memory card and edited and added borders and doodled all over my pics just for practice without even having to ask my husband any questions. The touch screen is so easy to use. It takes you thru step by step directions. I'm a scrapper and will defintely be taking this to my scrapbook conventions. I won't have to spend hours prior to going to my conventions printing out pictures I may or may not use.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: HP A626 Photosmart
customer_reviews.text: First, this printer will not print a full 4x6 print. It always leaves a white edge on two sides. Second, It will not print 5x7. It will not let you even select 5x7 Third, It will not let me install and reinstall. Fourth, HP Support will not help me, even for a price.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: My Own Kinkos!!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew what to expect!My job owns the HP PhotosmartA826!I looooove this one!It prints out excellent pictures...crisp and clear!I'm a mother,a teacher,and scrapbooker,this product is perfect and I never have to leave home!My husband brought this item for me for my b-day and I'm buyimg my mother one for christmas who is a scrapbooker,teacher,and mother,Lol!Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Martina Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second HP printer I bought the first was the 8750 photosmart it proves to be a very good printer one that uses only three ink cartriges. The A626 is providing some very nice pictures with options letting you type a caption from the printer. I recommend this printer to anyone who likes to have the ability to print from your memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Photosmart Great printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. Dose really good pictures and the the tings it can do are so cool. Ordered it and had it in a few days very fast shipping. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

product_meta.title: HP Photosmart A626 Compact Photo Printer (Q8541A#ABA)
product_meta.description:
HP A626 Photosmart Compact Photo Printer. View photos and navigate friendly menus with an easy to use, 4.8 inch color touchscreen. Share your memories when and where you want at parties, special occasions or at home without a PC. Easily print photos directly from memory cards, PictBridge enabled cameras or a PC. Show your favorite photos as a slide show and print any photo you see just by touching the screen. Wirelessly print from Bluetooth enabled devices. Make one of a kind memories, use the stylus to draw or write captions on photos. Create scrapbook ready photos and personalized greeting cards, using over 200 borders, graphics and more. Tell stories with your photos add captions and descriptions, using a touchscreen keyboard. Print photos in multiple sizes 5 x 7 and 4 x 6 inches, wallet, panorama and more. Print photos in a snap, using memory card slots and other photo only features. Preserve your memories with lab quality photos. Print true borderless photos ready to be shared no cutting or trimming necessary.

AMAZON.COM
The HP Photosmart A626 Compact Photo Printer is perfect for people who enjoy printing photos and wish to add captions, messages, and more--without a PC! You can use the built-in 4.8-inch color touchscreen to add creative touches such as writing captions and creating different album layouts, frames, graphics, and other effects. Using the screen, you can also do slide shows and print individual shots by simply touching them. The printer has built-in memory card slots that support Secure Digital/MultiMediaCard, CompactFlash, Memory Stick, Memory Stick Duo, and xD-Picture Card, allowing you to print directly from them. You can also print from a PictBridge-enabled camera or a PC. With the addition of a Bluetooth adapter, you can print wirelessly from Bluetooth devices.

 The A626 prints at up to 4800 by 1200 optimized dpi (on advanced photo paper) for great photos that last a long time. With the optional rechargeable battery, you can bring the small printer with you to family gatherings and parties for printing photos immediately and passing them around. With built-in HP software, you can remove red eye, slim subjects, and enhance images right on the screen without a computer. The printer has a 20-sheet input tray and supports Windows XP Home and Professional, Windows Vista, and Mac OS X 10.3.9 and 10.4.0. The HP Photosmart A626 Compact Photo Printer is backed by a 1-year warranty.

 What's in the Box
Photosmart A626 compact photo printer, 110 tri-color ink cartridge, Photosmart software on CD, setup guide, user's guide, and power supply.
feature_bullets: Photo printer with 4.8" color touchscreen for adding captions and other graphical effects
Prints photos at up to 4800 x 1200 resolution
